item.title: How to Manage Alarms in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Add an Alarm: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Delete an Alarm: With Click With Right Click With Menu No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Add a Timer With Click Step 1: First switch to Alarm mode. In the lower right, click the “+” or “Add an alarm” button. In the “Add new alarm” window that opens, click to edit the alarm settings and click the “Save” button.
